channel.title: Sample RSS Feed

item.title: Test Article 1
item.description: This is the first test article description.
item.content:encoded:
This is the full content of the first test article. It contains multiple paragraphs and some formatting.

Here is the second paragraph with some bold text and italic text.

A heading in the article

And some more content after the heading.
